issues.shortMessage: Handle the exception or explain in a comment why it can be ignored.
issues.fullMessage: When exceptions occur, it is usually a bad idea to simply ignore them. Instead, it is better to handle them properly, or at least to log them.

properties.title: Generic exceptions should not be ignored
